gui.tabs

Class Tab

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JScrollPane
            • gui.tabs.Tab
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MiscTab, RangedValueTab, SingleValueTab

    public abstract class Tab
extends javax.swing.JScrollPane
    An abstract class that represents a tab of CustomizationPanel. Contains general methods and properties to be used by its concrete extensions.

    Subclass of JScrollPane

    Author:
    Jacob Ressler & Anthony Lantz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        public javax.swing.JComponent addItem(java.lang.String label,
                                      javax.swing.JComponent item)
        Sets up a JPanel with a JLabel and a JComponent and adds it to the tab. Used by SingleValueTab and RangedValueTab.
        Parameters:
        label - the string for the JLabel
        item - the JComponent to be added
        Returns:
        item

      • addItem

        public javax.swing.JComponent addItem(java.lang.String label,
                                      javax.swing.JComponent item,
                                      java.lang.String layoutInfo)
        Sets up a JPanel with a JLabel and a JComponent and adds it to the tab. The JPanel is laid out according to the layoutInfo.
        Parameters:
        label - the string for the JLabel
        item - the JComponent to be added
        layoutInfo - the layout info for the JPanel
        Returns:
        item

      • removeItemAt

        public void removeItemAt(int index)
        Remove the child component at the specified index.

        Currently, this is not used, but will likely be used in a future implementation of MiscTab with a less restricted color pattern selection UI.

        Parameters:
        index - the index
